profile:
The Plumbing Expert Mechanical Services, Inc. is pleased to offer Plumbing, Filtration and Drain services around the GTA. An honest plumbing company based on a good reputation. What we offer is plumbers! Not technicians! We have over 14 years of experience and service to the Greater Toronto area and know what it takes get the job done right in the most cost effective way possible. We live in your neighborhood and understand your needs. We are a proud Canadian owned and operated which keeps us grounded and accountable. To earn your trust, we fix the problem the first time. We take pride in all our work including: 
• Low water pressure 
• Household Leaks 
• Appliance Installation
• Plumbing Fixtures Repair & Installation
• Sewage & Sump Pumps 
• Drain Cleaning & Repairs 
• Water Quality & Filtration systems
• Water Conservation 
• Custom homes 
• Renovation 
• Remodelling 
• Roughing in
service_area: The Plumbing Expert, provides plumbing and drains repairs and installation across the Greater Toronto Area, including Mississauga, Brampton, Georgetown, North York, Vaughan , Etobicoke, Caledon and surrounding. We offer complete Residential and commercial Mechanical Services.
products: FILTERS AND FILTRATION SYSTEMS TOILET SINKS FAUCETS BATHTUBS MUCH MORE
services: We offer expert plumbing services for Blocked or clogged drains dripping faucets leaky faucets & pipes hot water tank problems, new home plumbing Inspections, faucets, sinks, toilets, tubs blocked toilets drain odors frozen pipes, pipe thawing water purifiers/filtration toilet problems remodeling & renovations under cabinet leaks toilets that keep running sewer problems laundry room sinks & drains drain & sewage rootering radiator repairs ... The List Is Almost Endless!
brands: We offer most brands such as BRADFORD WHITE, MOEN, DELTA, GROHE, AMERICAN STANDARD, ELGER, HANSE GROHE, KOHLER CLACK FILTRATION EX....
specialities: We service and install High End fixtures, custom homes and plumb commercial jobs
payment_method: CASH,VISA, MASTER CARD, CHECK, EMAIL TRANSFER
licenses: MASTER PLUMBER, PLUMBING LICENSE, TSSA LICENSE

profile:
We at K2 Mechanical Services believe we are a growing business that provides our customers with an affordable solution without compromising quality or service.

The principle in K2 Mechanical Services has more than 25 years’ experience in the industrial/manufacturing sector, and wants to earn your business.

Our customers appreciate our devotion to professionalism which keeps them coming back each time new issues arise. 

Professional Construction Plumbing Company
Licensed
Insured
WSIB
Health and Safety
Quotations by appointment only
Scaled drawings preferred

Specializing in:

Process piping all materials and grades
Copper
Iron
Plastic
Threaded
Soldered
Grooved
Steam distribution
Steam piping
Condensate return systems
Condensate polishers
Heat exchangers

Storage tanks

Air distribution
Piping Systems
